apps.name: qBitController
apps.subtitle: Control qBittorrent from any device
apps.localizedDescription:
Free and open-source application for controlling qBittorrent on your servers.

Features:
- Manage multiple qBittorrent servers
- Add torrents using magnet links or files
- See detailed information about torrents
- Perform various actions on torrents such as pausing, resuming, deleting, and more
- Sort torrents by their name, size, progress, download/upload speed, and more
- Filter torrents by their state, category, tag, and tracker
- Manage categories and tags
- View RSS feeds, create auto download rules
- Search torrents online

versions.localizedDescription:
- Improved performance for torrent list and search results
- Dates are now displayed in relative format (can be reverted in settings)
- Changed selected item colors
- Added select all and select inverse to RSS and search torrents multi-select
- Added read cache hit to statistics
- Bug fixes

- Added option to change app color
- Bug fixes
- Fix authentication failure that occurs after the first authentication expires

- Removed minimum character requirements for server username and password
- Torrent folders can now be expanded or collapsed by clicking directly on the folder
- Minor user interface improvements
- Bug fixes
